H0.text: From which continent does the world's smallest bear the Sun Bear originate. Africa

H1.text: From which continent does the world's smallest bear the Sun Bear originate. North America

H2.text: From which continent does the world's smallest bear the Sun Bear originate. South America

H3.text: From which continent does the world's smallest bear the Sun Bear originate. SEAsia

A4.text: The sun bear is native to the tropical forests of Southeast Asia.

A5.text: The Malayan Sun Bear is found in Borneo.
